Html: For some reason when I am in the office, battle.net does not work. I wanted to create a character from scratch. When you select new character it opens up to a druid. Is any way to change it to a warrior and them proceed from there by selecting all the talants?

I'm pretty sure that means that work doesn't want you going to wow-related website so they block your network traffic to there.

Look at the stats pane, that's where you will set what class, race etc, you are.

Yes, there is. On the stats panel, click the 'Expand to Edit Basic Information" bar. From there you can select race, class, realm and proffessions. You can also enter your toon's name and server so that you can update/reload it later.
